702340f-b.title: Brooklyn: 4th Avenue - 42nd Street
702340f-b.text:
4th Avenue, west side, from 42nd to 43rd Streets, show-
ing St. Michaels Roman Catholic Church and school (left). View
is across 43rd Street; view 2 across 42nd Street.
July 4, 1930
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
